item.title: dmesg命令时间显示问题
item.author: Peng
item.description: dmesg时间显示问题 默认显示时间戳 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 # dmesg [24241362.110367] rmlog.sh (14746): drop_caches: 1 [24241362.120529] rmlog.sh (14746): drop_caches: 2 [24241362.218306] rmlog.sh (14746): drop_caches: 3 [24846165.362560] rmlog.sh (7364): drop_caches: 1 [24846165.371097] rmlog.sh (7364): drop_caches: 2 [24846165.463682] rmlog.sh (7364): drop_caches: 3 添加 -T参数，显示人类可以
